name: Item Balance (Simple)
query:
select c.name as "Item:Link/Item:120",
	  a.name as "Item Variant::150",
	  c.item_group as "Item Group:Link/Item Group:120",
	  c.brand as "Brand:Link/Brand:120",
	  b.warehouse as "Warehouse:Link/Supplier:120",
	  d.supplier_name as "Warehouse Name:Link/Supplier:120",
	  b.lot as "Lot:Link/Lot:120",
	  b.actual_qty as "Balance Qty:Float:140"
 from `tabItem Variant` a left join `tabBin` b
 ON a.name = b.item_code left join `tabItem` c ON c.name = a.item
 left join `tabSupplier` d on b.warehouse = d.name
 ;
